products.title: Roller, 4156 Minimalist Pattern - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Transparentinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Hive Silkweave Blackout Raven Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: This blackout textured fabric features a stripe within its pattern. Hive silkweave would look in place in a kitchen or conservatory with added green plants to add to the bohemian feel. This fabric features a honey-combed structure, meaning the guide wires are hidden from view. Product id: db-pls0117 fabric colour: raven material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: White (1016)
products.description: The velux pleated blind is an elegant way to provide privacy while bathing your room in a pleasant , soft light. It can be positioned anywhere in the roof window to adjust the amount of incoming light an you can still enjoy a view of he outside. Softly diffuses incoming daylight.
